Title: Twilight
Overview: When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire. Despite Edward's repeated cautions, Bella can't stay away from him, a fatal move that endangers her own life.
Tagline: When you can live forever, what do you live for?
Keywords: soulmates, vampire, forbidden love, immortality, trust, desire, duringcreditsstinger, woman director, interspecies romance, based on young adult novel, fang vamp
production_companies: Summit Entertainment, Maverick Films, Imprint Entertainment, Goldcrest Pictures, Temple Hill Entertainment, Twilight Productions
Cast: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Billy Burke
